verses.verse: Now when Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> found <S%H3045><s%> out all that was done, <S%H6213><s%> Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> tore <S%H7167><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and put on <S%H3847><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> with ashes, <S%H665><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and wailed <S%H2199><s%> loudly <S%H1419><s%> and bitterly. <S%H4751><s%>

He came <S%H935><s%> even before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s gate, <S%H8179><s%> for no one is allowed inside <S%H935><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s gate <S%H8179><s%> clothed <S%H3830><s%> with sackcloth. <S%H8242><s%>

Esther <S%H635><s%>'s maidens <S%H5291><s%> and her eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her this, <S%H4436><s%> and the queen was exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> grieved. <S%H2342><s%> She sent <S%H7971><s%> clothing <S%H899><s%> to Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> to <S%H5493><s%> replace <S%H3847><s%> his sackcloth; <S%H8242><s%> but he didn't <S%H6901><s%> receive it.

Then Esther <S%H635><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Hathach, <S%H2047><s%> one of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s eunuchs, <S%H5631><s%> whom he had appointed <S%H5975><s%> to attend <S%H6440><s%> her, <S%H6680><s%> and commanded him to go to Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> to find out what this was, <S%H3045><s%> and why it was.
So Hathach <S%H2047><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> to city <S%H5892><s%> square <S%H7339><s%> which was before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him of all that had happened <S%H7136><s%> to him, <S%H6575><s%> and the exact sum of the money <S%H3701><s%> that Haman <S%H2001><s%> had promised <S%H559><s%> to pay <S%H8254><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>'s treasuries <S%H1595><s%> for the destruction <S%H6><s%> of the Jews. <S%H3064><s%>

He also gave <S%H5414><s%> him the copy <S%H6572><s%> of the writing <S%H3791><s%> of the decree <S%H1881><s%> that was given <S%H5414><s%> out in Shushan <S%H7800><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H7200><s%> to show it to Esther, <S%H635><s%> and to declare <S%H5046><s%> it to her, <S%H6680><s%> and to urge her to go in <S%H935><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> to make supplication <S%H2603><s%> to him, <S%H1245><s%> and to make request before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H5971><s%> for her people.
Hathach <S%H2047><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Mordecai. <S%H4782><s%>
Then Esther <S%H635><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Hathach, <S%H2047><s%> and gave him a message <S%H6680><s%> to Mordecai: <S%H4782><s%>

"All the king <S%H4428><s%>'s servants, <S%H5650><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s provinces, <S%H4082><s%> know, <S%H3045><s%> that whoever, <S%H376><s%> whether man or woman, <S%H802><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> without being called, <S%H7121><s%> there is one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H1881><s%> for him, <S%H4191><s%> that he be put to death, except <S%H905><s%> those to whom the king <S%H4428><s%> might hold out <S%H3447><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> scepter, <S%H8275><s%> that he may live. <S%H2421><s%> I have not been called <S%H7121><s%> to come in <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> these thirty <S%H7970><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>"
They told <S%H5046><s%> to Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%>'s words. <S%H1697><s%>

Then Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> asked <S%H559><s%> them return answer <S%H7725><s%> to Esther, <S%H635><s%> "Don't <S%H1819><s%> think to yourself <S%H5315><s%> that you will escape <S%H4422><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> any more than all the Jews. <S%H3064><s%>

For if you remain <S%H2790><s%> silent <S%H2790><s%> now, <S%H6256><s%> then relief <S%H7305><s%> and deliverance <S%H2020><s%> will come <S%H5975><s%> to the Jews <S%H3064><s%> from another <S%H312><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> but you and your father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> will perish. <S%H6><s%> Who knows <S%H3045><s%> if you haven't <S%H5060><s%> come to the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> for such a time as this? <S%H6256><s%>"
Then Esther <S%H635><s%> asked <S%H559><s%> them to answer <S%H7725><s%> Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%>

"Go, <S%H3212><s%> gather together <S%H3664><s%> all the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who are present <S%H4672><s%> in Shushan, <S%H7800><s%> and fast <S%H6684><s%> for me, <S%H398><s%> and neither eat nor drink <S%H8354><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> or day. <S%H3117><s%> I and my maidens <S%H5291><s%> will also fast <S%H6684><s%> the same way. <S%H3651><s%> Then I will go <S%H935><s%> in to the king, <S%H4428><s%> which is against the law; <S%H1881><s%> and if I perish, <S%H6><s%> I perish. <S%H6><s%>"
So Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> went his way, <S%H5674><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> according to all that Esther <S%H635><s%> had commanded him. <S%H6680><s%>
